<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74129</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74129</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>a672c3ac-c0f8-441d-baaf-8ef1744b7ef4#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az Alpok havas hegycsúcsa</string>
            <string language="en">Snowy peak of the Alps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Snowy Spitze der Alpen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Crête de Milou des Alpes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pico de Snowy dos alpes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Picco dello Snowy delle alpi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χιονώδης αιχμή των Αλπεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pico Nevado de las montan@as</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az Alpok legmagasabb csúcsait örök hó fedi</string>
            <string language="en">The highest peaks of the Alps are covered with endless snow</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">magashegységek,  függőleges övezetesség,  Alpok,  </string>
            <string language="en">high mountains, vertical zonality, the Alps</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die höchsten Spitzen der Alpen werden mit 
endlosem Schnee umfaßt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les crêtes les plus élevées des Alpes sont 
couvertes de neige sans fin</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os picos os mais elevados dos alpes são cobertos
com a neve infinita</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli più alti picchi delle alpi sono coperti di 
neve infinita</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι υψηλότερες αιχμές των Αλπεων καλύπτονται με το 
ατελείωτο χιόνι</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los picos más altos de las montan@as se cubren con
nieve sin fin</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hohe Berge, vertikales zonality, die Alpen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hautes montagnes, zonality vertical, les Alpes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">montanhas elevadas, zonality vertical, os alpes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">alte montagne, zonality verticale, le alpi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υψηλά βουνά, κάθετο zonality, οι Αλπεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">montañas altas, zonality vertical, las montan@as</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74129</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>

    <item>

      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
